name: FarmaTrust Track and Trace
description: Our core software solution is a pharmaceutical medicines track and trace capability designed and built to establish supply chain tracking as a public service utility.

SDGs.evidenceText: This project aims to reduce health inequalities (up to 1m preventable and unnecessary deaths a year in LMIC) by ensuring medicines are never diverted away from those who need them most, or that sub-standard or falsified medicines are never given to a patient in a LMIC.
